text: Very short staffed. Does it on purpose.  MGR told me they were only busy for 40 minutes and then dies down for lunch. Every table dirty, people moving dirty plates over to one side, wiping their table off themselves so they had a place to â€¦More

text: Our fav pizza hut in KC!! Love to grab buffet for our lunch as we work right down the street. Staff is awesome. The ladies always take real good care of us. Drinks always refilled- gets us seated fast despite the busy lunch hour and never â€¦More

text: Went to this location for the first time because it's close to my house and had a free pizza offer because another location messed up my order. Long story short ordered online for carry out, pizza actually was done quicker than anticipated, â€¦More

name: sary charm
text: Food is fresh and hot, The service was fast, the waitress named Robin was very nice  and enthusiastic. The indoor cleanliness of the restaurant and the bathroom was perfect. We will most likely come back during the next 30 days.

name: Lawrence Berkland
text: Very nice. Place was very clean. The employees were extremely friendly and pointed out specials during my order that gave me a better value. Pizza was cooked just right. I would go back again.

name: MacKenzie Lance
text: Arrived at 8:10 PM and the dining area was completely closed, the salad bar was already completely taken down and the lady working said they had already vacuumed so they would not open it again for the night... but online it says they close â€¦More

text: Call it a pet peeve, I donâ€™t like when someone who calls is given priority over me when Iâ€™ve been waiting in line. But thatâ€™s what happened here, waiting for a while for a pick up with no workers. Asst manager shows when the phone rings â€¦More

name: Jen Weber
text: Perfect, SPICY Wings! My husband can handle heat and ordered the spiciest available. They do not disappoint! No lie, I enjoyed watching him blotch up and sweat.

name: Arlinda Salazar
text: Wow! I left feeling so happy! My husband and I were passing through and we enjoy our Pizza Huts however lately we've been feeling most Pizza Huts have slowely been losing their good customer service. This completely changed today when we â€¦More

text: This pizza hut is very unique to the one I usually frequent in liberty. It's more of a sit down style restaurant than just your regular pick the food up at the counter style hut. While this would be a great feature, it seems that the â€¦More

name: David Reeves
text: We do the weekday lunch buffet often. The food is fresh, new pizzas keep coming out. Free drink refills, and the service is fast and friendly. Great value at lunchtime.

name: Rachael M
text: All in all id say that out of the other places in this small area we have eatten at the last few days this was the best. We are stuck here while our truck is being worked on, and no other restaurant seems to know what customer service is.

text: Came in for lunch buffet on a weekday. Short staffed but would not have known. Waitress had that place under control and they kept the buffet full the entire time. My kids were getting the Book It! free pizza but the waitress still let them get some bread sticks. Great customer service!

text: My friend Leroy and I were hungry around 7:00 pm on our stay here in Kansas City on November 25th of 2017, we went in the door to get us a seat, lights were out in the dining room area and they said "dining room is closed!." At 7:00 pm at night????!!!! Definitely not happy about it. Who does that???!!!

text: The "manager" of this Puzza Hut did not know that they were out of cookies. After ordering she came to our table to notify us that the cookie was not available,  when asked why weren't we notified beforehand she stated that no one had â€¦More
